</div>
</script></div><div class="gnav-util__wishlist-confirm-bottom gnav-util-overlay-bottom js-wishlist-confirm-content-bottom"><div class="gnav-util__wishlist-confirm-buttons"> <a class="gnav-util__wishlist-confirm-button-wishlist button button--dark" href="https://www.jomalone.com//account/favorites.tmpl">View Wishlist</a></div></div></div><div class="gnav-util__wishlist-confirm-no-items gnav-util-overlay-content-no-items"><div class="gnav-util__wishlist-confirm-empty">You haven't added any products to your Wishlist.</div><div class="gnav-util__wishlist-confirm-buttons"> <a class="gnav-util__wishlist-confirm-button-wishlist button button--dark" href="/most-loved">Shop Bestsellers</a></div></div></div> <!-- localized content for js --> <span class="js-wishlist_confirm_success_msg hidden" data-message='&lt;p&gt;Item has been added to your wishlist &lt;a href="/account/favorites.tmpl"&gt;your wishlist.&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;'></span> <span class="js-wishlist_confirm_empty_wishlist hidden" data-message="You haven&amp;#039;t added any products to your Wishlist."></span></div></div><div class="gnav-util__notification js-gnav-util-wishlist-notification hidden"> <a class="gnav-util__notification-close js-gnav-util-wishlist-notification-close" href="#" title=""> <svg aria-labelledby="icon-close" class="icon icon--close" role="img"><title id="icon-close">Close</title> <use xlink:href="#close"></use> </svg> </a><div class="gnav-util__notification-content js-gnav-util-wishlist-notification-content"></div></div></div><!-- /#cms-api-section: gnav_wishlist --></div></div></div><div class="gnav-header-block__cart"><div class="block block-nodeblock block-nodeblock-11678 block-nodeblock-96 block-template-gnav-cart-v1"><div class="node node-elc-nodeblock no-sidebars js-analytics-content-block clearfix" id="node-11678" role="article" trackname="gnav utility - cart|gnav_cart_v1|site_setup_initial_localization"> <!-- #cms-api-section: gnav_cart --><div class="gnav-util gnav-util-cart js-gnav-util-cart"> <a class="js-gnav-util-trigger--cart gnav-util__icon gnav-util__icon--cart" href="https://www.jomalone.com/checkout/viewcart.tmpl" tabindex="-1" title="My Bag"> <span class="visuallyhidden">My Bag</span> <span class="gnav-util__icon__cart-count"></span> <svg aria-labelledby="icon-bag" class="icon icon--bag" role="img" tabindex="0"><title id="icon-bag">My Bag</title> <use xlink:href="#bag"></use> </svg> </a><div class="gnav-util__content gnav-util-cart__content js-gnav-util-cart-content gnav-util-overlay hidden"><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-header js-gnav-util-cart-content-header gnav-util-overlay-header"><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-header-title gnav-util-overlay-title">BAG</div><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-loading loader"></div></div><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-products js-gnav-util-cart-content-products gnav-util-overlay-content"><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-products-details js-gnav-util-cart-content-products-details"><script class="inline-template" path="cart/product_row" type="text/html">

class="gnav-util-cart__content-products-view-bag-link" href="https://www.jomalone.com/checkout/viewcart.tmpl">VIEW BAG</a> [<span class="gnav-util-cart__content-products-bottom-view-bag-counter class="gnav-util-cart__content-products-checkout-button button button--dark" href="https://www.jomalone.com/checkout/viewcart.tmpl">Checkout</a></div><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-products-bottom-promos"> <!-- any inline templates matching on order promo codes are placed here --></div></div></div><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-products gnav-util-cart__content-products-no-items js-gnav-util-cart-content-products-no-items gnav-util-overlay-content-no-items"><div class="gnav-util-cart__content-products-bag-empty">Your bag is currently empty</div></div></div> <span class="js-gnav-util-cart-success_msg hidden" data-message="This Item has been added to your bag."></span> <span class="js-gnav-util-cart-empty-bag hidden" data-message="Your bag is currently empty"></span><div class="gnav-util__notification js-gnav-util-cart-notification hidden"> <a class="gnav-util__notification-close js-gnav-util-cart-notification-close" href="#" title=""> <svg aria-labelledby="icon-close" class="icon icon--close" role="img"><title id="icon-close">Close</title> <use xlink:href="#close"></use> </svg> </a><div class="gnav-util__notification-content js-gnav-util-cart-notification-content"></div></div></div><!-- /#cms-api-section: gnav_cart --></div></div></div></div><div class="gnav-header-overlay js-gnav-header-overlay"> <label class="gnav-header-overlay--label" for="gnav_mobile_trigger_input"> <svg class="icon icon--close" role="button"><title>Close</title> <use xlink:href="#close_small"></use> </svg> </label></div></div> </header></div></div></div></div></div></header> <!-- Begin site content here --><div class="site-content" id="main-focus-content"><div class="block block-system block-system-main"> <article class="node-8348 node node-page blog-post no-sidebars js-analytics-content-block" role="article" trackname="Customer Service - Privacy Policy|hero_block_v1|210520 - Privacy Policy"><div class="field-content"> <article class="cs-page-formatter js-cs-page-formatter-v1 clearfix"><div class="cs-page-formatter__back"> <a class="cs-page-formatter__back-link" href="#" title="Back">Back</a></div><div class="cs-page-formatter__menu-title"><h1>Customer Service</h1></div> <div class="cs-page-formatter__content-container"> <aside class="cs-page-formatter__navigation"> <article class="node-8210 node node-menu no-sidebars js-analytics-content-block" role="article" trackname="Customer Service Menu|201020 - Launch"><div class="field-menu"><div class="menu menu--lvl-1"><ul class="menu__list menu__list--lvl-1"><li class="first leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/faq">FAQS</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/contact-us">CONTACT US</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/my-profile">MY PROFILE</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/my-order">MY ORDER</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/delivery">SHIPPING &amp; HANDLING</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/returns-exchanges">RETURNS &amp; EXCHANGES</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/shopping-online">SHOPPING ONLINE</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/terms-conditions">TERMS &amp; CONDITIONS</a></li><li class="leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/our-company/corporate-sales">CORPORATE GIFTING</a></li><li class="last leaf menu__item menu__item--lvl-1"><a class="menu__link menu__link--lvl-1" href="/customer-service/bopis-faq">BUY ONLINE, PICK-UP IN STORE</a></li></ul></div></div> </article> </aside> <section class="cs-page-formatter__content"><div class="cs-page-formatter__content-items"><div class="cs-page-formatter__content-item-content"><div class="hero-block js-analytics-tag-content-module content-block"><div class="hero-block__wrapper content-block__content-wrapper"><div class="hero-block__media-wrapper hero-block-no-media horizontal-align-center"></div><div class="hero-block__content-wrapper content-block__content-wrapper horizontal-align-start"><div class="hero-block__content horizontal-align-start"><div class="content-block__content mobile-max-width-80"><div class="content-block__line content-block__line--header"><div class="mantle-custom-text custom-text format--default title--h2"><p>JO MALONE LONDON INC. UNITED STATES PRIVACY POLICY</p></div></div></div><div class="content-block__content max-width-100 mobile-max-width-80"><div class="content-block__line content-block__line--content"><div class="mantle-custom-text custom-text format--default body-text"><div class="basic-text-container text-left"><p><b>Last Update</b>: May 2021</p><br/><p><b>Jo Malone London Inc.</b> (“Jo Malone, we, us, or our”) respects your privacy and values the relationship we have with you. This Privacy Policy describes the types of personal information we collect, how we use the information, with whom we share it, and the choices available regarding our use of the information. We also describe the measures we take to protect the security of the information and how to contact us about our privacy practices.</p><br/><p>Jo Malone products are available for sale in many places—online at jomalone.com, in Jo Malone owned retail stores, and third-party retail locations. This Privacy Policy applies to the personal information collected on jomalone.com, any website, mobile application or document that refers to this Privacy Policy, and in Jo Malone owned retail stores. Unless otherwise indicated at the time that you provide your personal information, any personal information collected at third-party retail locations is not provided to us and is not subject to this Privacy Policy.</p><br/><p>Click on one of the links below to jump to the listed section:</p><br/><ul class="jump-menu"><li><a href="#collect">Information We Collect</a></li><li><a href="#how">How We Collect Information</a></li><li><a href="#share">Information We Share</a></li><li><a href="#rights-choices">Your Rights an Choices</a></li><li><a href="#cookies">Cookies, Targeted Advertising &amp; Analytics</a></li><li><a href="#transfers">International Transfers</a></li><li><a href="#children">Children's Privacy</a></li><li><a href="#how-protect">How We Protect Personal Information</a></li><li><a href="#links-websites">Links to Other Websites</a></li><li><a href="#updates">Updates to Our Privacy Policy</a></li><li><a href="#contact-us">How to Contact Us</a></li><li><a href="#california">Additional Rights and Disclosures for California Residents</a></li></ul><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="collect"><span>Information We Collect</span></h2><p>We may collect or may have collected the following categories of information about you. In some cases, the information we collect may fall within more than one category.</p><ul><li><b>Contact information and personal identifiers</b>, such as your name, address, email address, telephone number, and username or social media handle.</li><li><b>Device identifiers</b>, such as information about your device like your MAC address, IP address, or other online identifiers.</li><li><b>Demographic information</b>, such as your age, sex, and gender (some of which may be protected by applicable law).</li><li><b>Physical characteristics</b>, such as your hair type and color, skin type, and eye color.</li><li><b>Commercial information</b>, such as the products or services you have purchased, returned or considered, and your product preferences.</li><li><b>Payment information</b>, such as your method of payment and payment card information (including payment card number, expiration date, delivery address and billing address).</li><li><b>Identity verification information</b>, such as photo identification for in-store pick-ups, and other authentication information like passwords.</li><li><b>Online or network activity information</b>, such as information regarding your interaction with our website or mobile applications, other digital properties, and advertisements, information about your browsing and search history on our website or mobile applications, and log file information which includes, but may not be limited to, your browser type, webpages you visit, and other electronic network activity.</li><li><b>Geolocation information</b>, such as information that can help identify your physical location like your GPS coordinates or the approximate location of your mobile device.</li><li><b>Audio and visual information</b>, such as recordings of your voice when you call our customer service and images we record through CCTV in our Jo Malone London owned retail stores.</li><li><b>Professional or employment-related information</b>, such as information from your resume, employment history, education information, and professional licenses or certifications.</li><li><b>Health and medical information</b>, such as skincare concerns, diagnosis, medical reports and history.</li><li><b>User Content</b>, such as your communications with us and any other content you provide (including photographs and images, videos, reviews, articles, survey responses and comments).</li><li><b>Inferences</b> drawn from or created based on any of the information identified above.</li></ul><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="how"><span>How We Collect Information</span></h2><p>We may obtain personal information about you from various sources. The categories of sources from which we collect personal information are:</p><ul><li><b>Directly from you</b>, such as when you make a purchase on our website or in one of our Jo Malone London owned retail stores, contact us with a question or complaint, use one of our mobile applications, create an account on our website, respond to a survey, participate in a contest or other promotion, sign-up to attend an event, apply for employment, or sign-up to receive marketing communications.</li><li><b>From your friends or family members</b>, such as when your friend or family member sends you a gift or makes a referral.</li><li><b>Cookies and automatic collection methods</b>. When you visit our website or use one of our mobile applications, and when you open or click on emails we send you, we, and third parties we work with, may automatically collect information from your browser or device using technologies such as cookies, web beacons, pixel tags, and similar technologies. Cookies are small text files that websites send to your computer or other Internet-connected device to uniquely identify your browser or to store information or settings in your browser. Web beacons or pixel tags are small images which are embedded into our website or emails that provide us with information about your browser or device, or whether you open or clicked on the emails we send you. These technologies enable us, or the third parties who place such technologies, to collect information such as device identifiers and online or other network activity information.</li><li><b>Through in-store and other offline technologies</b>, such as video surveillance and WiFi technology in and around our Jo Malone London owned retail stores, and call recording technology when you speak to customer service.</li><li><b>From our business partners and service providers</b>, such as demographic companies, analytics providers, advertising companies and networks, and other third parties that we choose to collaborate or work with.</li><li><b>From social media platforms and networks</b>, such as Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Instagram. For example, we may obtain your information from a social media platform or network if you interact with us on social media or choose to log-in to our website using your social media credentials.</li><li><b>From other Estee Lauder Companies brands or affiliates</b> that you have interacted with.</li></ul><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="use"><span>How We Use Information</span></h2><p>We may use the information we have about you:</p><ul><li>To provide products and services to you, such as fulfilling orders and processing payments, creating, servicing and/or maintaining your account, assisting with product selection and replenishment, and managing current or past purchases.</li><li>To communicate with you, including to respond to your inquiries or complaints, and to help you place an order.</li><li>To administer your participation in special events, contests, sweepstakes, surveys, and promotions.</li><li>For marketing and advertising, such as to send you marketing and advertising materials via postal mail, text message or email, and to show you advertisements for products and/or services tailored to your interests on social media and other websites.</li><li>For analytics purposes, such as to understand how you use our website and mobile applications, understand your preferred method of purchasing with us, determine what browser and devices you use to visit our website or mobile applications, and to evaluate and improve our products, services, advertisements, website and mobile applications.</li><li>To operate and improve our business, including to respond to employment applications, provide quality assurance, conduct research and development to develop new products and services, and perform accounting, auditing and other internal business functions.</li><li>For legal and security purposes, such as to detect, prevent, and prosecute harmful, fraudulent, or illegal activity, loss prevention, identify and repair bugs on our website or mobile applications, and to comply with applicable legal requirements, relevant industry standards and our policies.</li><li>Other short-term, transient use.</li><li>We also may use the information in other ways for which we provide specific notice at the time of collection.</li></ul><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="share"><span>Information We Share</span></h2><p>We may share your personal information with:</p><ul><li><b>Our corporate brands and affiliates</b>. For a list of our corporate brands see <a href="https://www.elcompanies.com/en/our-brands">https://www.elcompanies.com/en/our-brands</a> and for a list of our corporate affiliates see <a href="https://www.elcompanies.com/en/news-and-media/contact-us">https://www.elcompanies.com/en/news-and-media/contact-us</a>.</li><li><b>Service providers</b>. We may transfer personal information to service providers who perform services on our behalf based on our instructions. We do not authorize these service providers to use or disclose the information except as necessary to perform services on our behalf or comply with legal requirements. Examples of these service providers include entities that process credit card payments, fulfill orders and provide web hosting, advertising, and marketing services.</li><li><b>Parties to a corporate transaction</b>. We also reserve the right to transfer personal information we have about you in the event we sell or transfer all or a portion of our business or assets. Should such a sale or transfer occur, we will use reasonable efforts to direct the transferee to use personal information you have provided to us in a manner that is consistent with this Privacy Policy. Following such a sale or transfer, you may contact the entity to which we transferred your personal information with any inquiries concerning the processing of such information.</li><li><b>Other third parties</b>. In addition, we may disclose personal information about you (i) if we are required to do so by law or legal process, (ii) to law enforcement authorities or other government officials, (iii) when we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to prevent physical harm or financial loss, or in connection with an investigation of suspected or actual fraudulent or illegal activity, (iv) when disclosure of your personal information is otherwise required or permitted by law, (v) with your consent.</li></ul><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="rights-choices"><span>Your Rights and Choices</span></h2><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Accessing, Updating and Modifying Personal Information</span></h5><p>Subject to applicable law, you may have the right to request access to and receive details about the personal information we maintain about you, update and correct inaccuracies in your personal information, and have the personal information deleted, as appropriate. These rights may be limited in some circumstances by local law. We may take reasonable steps to verify your identity before granting access or making corrections. You may request to access, change or delete your personal information through our Privacy Request Portal.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Email Opt-Out</span></h5><p>You can opt-out from receiving marketing or clienteling communications by email by following the instructions within the emails you receive from us or by contacting us through our <a href="https://privacyportal-cdn.onetrust.com/dsarwebform/84bcbfa6-9d87-4573-b6f8-acfb1a7839a8/1da52190-609a-499b-bc4e-47ae21c4def0.html" target="_blank">Privacy Request Portal</a>. Please note that your opt-out request is specific to the particular type of email communication you receive from us. For example, if you opt-out from a clienteling email, you will no longer receive clienteling email communications, but you may still receive email marketing communications from us. Further, if you opt-out from both clienteling email communications and marketing email communications, we may still send you transactional or operational emails. Examples of transactional or operational emails include, purchase or shipping confirmations, password resets, profile updates or other account related messages.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Postal Mail Opt-Out</span></h5><p>You can opt-out from receiving marketing communications by postal mail by following the instructions that may be included in a particular promotion. You also can request that we refrain from sending you promotional postal mail by contacting us through our <a href="https://privacyportal-cdn.onetrust.com/dsarwebform/84bcbfa6-9d87-4573-b6f8-acfb1a7839a8/1da52190-609a-499b-bc4e-47ae21c4def0.html" target="_blank">Privacy Request Portal</a>.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Text Message Opt-Out</span></h5><p>You can opt-out from receiving text messages from us by replying STOP to the text message you receive from us or make a request through our <a href="https://privacyportal-cdn.onetrust.com/dsarwebform/84bcbfa6-9d87-4573-b6f8-acfb1a7839a8/1da52190-609a-499b-bc4e-47ae21c4def0.html" target="_blank">Privacy Request Portal</a>. Please note that this will only opt you out of the specific text messaging program associated with that number.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Push Notifications Opt-Out</span></h5><p>When you download one of our mobile applications, we may provide you with the option to opt-in to receive push notifications. You may, after downloading one of our mobile applications, opt-out of receiving push notifications by adjusting the settings on your mobile device.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Geolocation Information Opt-Out</span></h5><p>When you use one of our mobile applications, we may ask you to share your location. You may choose not to share your geolocation details by adjusting your mobile device’s location services settings.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="cookies"><span>Cookies, Targeted Advertising &amp; Analytics</span></h2><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Cookies</span></h5><br/><p>Cookies are small text files that websites send to your computer or other Internet-connected device to uniquely identify your browser or to store information or settings in your browser. We use different types of cookies on our website, including performance cookies, functional cookies and targeting cookies. For details on these types of cookies and information on how to opt-out, click here: <a class="ot-sdk-show-settings">Cookie Settings</a></p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Cookie Settings</span></h5><p>Please note that your opt-out only applies to the browser you use to submit your opt-out, so if you use multiple browsers or devices, you must opt-out on each browser, on each device. Your opt-out is enabled using cookies so once you opt-out, if you delete your browser’s saved cookies on a device, you will need to opt-out again on that browser on that device.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Targeted Advertising</span></h5><p>We work with third party advertising companies (such as ad networks) to serve advertisements for us. These advertising companies may use cookies and other technologies to collect device identifiers and online or network activity information, such as information about the websites you visit over time and the advertisements you click on, in order to deliver advertisements that are targeted to you. You can opt-out of this form of targeted advertising from the companies we work with by changing your Cookie Settings</p><p>Please note that even if you opt-out of this form of targeted advertising, you may still see ads from us, but the ads will not be targeted based on behavioral information about you. To learn more about this type of advertising in general, visit the Digital Advertising Alliance at <a href="http://www.aboutads.info/choices">www.aboutads.info/choices</a> or the Network Advertising Initiative at <a href="http://www.networkadvertising.org/choices">www.networkadvertising.org/choices</a>.</p><p>We also work with third-party platforms, including platforms operated by social networks, such as Google, and Facebook, to show you advertisements. We may convert your email address, telephone number, or other information into a unique value and have these third-party platforms match this unique value with a user on their platform or with other data they may have collected about you. This matching enables us to deliver advertisements to you and others on these platforms. You also can request that we refrain from using your personal information in this way by contacting us through our <a href="https://privacyportal-cdn.onetrust.com/dsarwebform/84bcbfa6-9d87-4573-b6f8-acfb1a7839a8/1da52190-609a-499b-bc4e-47ae21c4def0.html" target="_blank">Privacy Request Portal</a>.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Do Not Track and Advertising Across Different Websites</span></h5><p>We currently do not change our tracking practices in response to “do-not-track” signals or other similar mechanisms. Third parties that have content or services on our website such as a social feature, analytics service, or an advertising network partner, may obtain information about your browsing or usage habits. These third parties do not change their tracking practices in response to “do-not-track” signals from your web browser and we do not obligate these parties to honor “do-not-track” signals. To learn more about browser tracking signals and “Do Not Track,” please visit <a href="http://allabountdnt.com">http://allabountdnt.com</a>.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Analytics Services</span></h5><p>We may use analytics services, such as Google Analytics, on our website, our social media pages, or our mobile applications to help us evaluate and analyze how visitors use these platforms. For specific details on how Google collects and uses information on our website, social media pages, or mobile applications, please visit: How Google Uses Data.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="transfers"><span>International Transfers</span></h2><p>We may transfer the personal information we have about you to countries other than the country in which the information was originally collected and your personal information may be processed and stored outside of your country of residence. Those countries may not have the same data protection laws as your country of residence and your personal information will be subject to applicable foreign laws. When we transfer your information to other countries, we will protect that information in the manner described in this Privacy Policy.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="children"><span>Children's Privacy</span></h2><p>This website is not intended for or directed to children under the age of thirteen and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of thirteen on the website. If we become aware that a child under the age of thirteen has provided us with personal information, we will delete the information from our records.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="how-protect"><span>How We Protect Information</span></h2><p>We maintain reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards designed to protect the personal information you provide against accidental, unlawful or unauthorized destruction, loss, alteration, access, disclosure, or use.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="links-websites"><span>Links to Other Websites</span></h2><p>Our website or mobile applications may provide links to other websites for your convenience and information. These websites may operate independently from us. Linked websites may have their own privacy notices or policies, which we strongly suggest you review if you visit any linked websites. To the extent any linked websites you visit are not owned or controlled by us, we are not responsible for the websites’ content, any use of the websites, or the privacy practices of the websites.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="updates"><span>Updates to Our Privacy Policy</span></h2><p>This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically and without prior notice to you to reflect changes in our personal information practices. We will post a prominent notice on our website to notify you of any significant changes to our privacy practices and indicate at the top of the Privacy Policy when it was most recently updated.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="contact-us"><span>How to Contact</span></h2><p>If you have any questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at <a href="mailto:privacy@estee.com">privacy@estee.com</a>.</p><p>If we need, or are required, to contact you concerning any event that involves your personal information we may do so by telephone or email.</p><br/><br/><br/><h2 class="title--h2" id="california"><span>Additional Rights and Disclosures for California Residents</span></h2><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Disclosures of Personal Information</span></h5><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed your personal information to certain categories of third parties, as described below.</p><p> </p><table border="2" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 80%"><thead><tr><th style="width: 35%;"><p><strong>Category </strong></p></th><th style="width: 65%;"><p><strong>Disclosed to Third Parties </strong></p></th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Contact information and personal identifiers</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- fraud detection providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Device Identifiers</p><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;"> </p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- fraud detection providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Demographic information</p><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;"> </p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Physical characteristics</p><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;"> </p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Commercial information</p><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;"> </p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- fraud detection providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Payment information</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- fraud detection providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Identity verification information</p><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;"> </p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- fraud detection providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Online or network activity information</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- fraud detection providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Geolocation information</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates.</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- fraud detection providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Audio and visual information</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates.</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Professional or employment related information</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates.</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Health and medical information</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates.</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">User Content</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates.</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p style="margin-left:7.5pt;">Inferences</p></td><td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><p>We may disclose or may have disclosed this information to:</p><ul><li><p>- our corporate brands and affiliates</p></li><li><p>- service providers</p></li><li><p>- law enforcement authorities or other government officials where required or permitted by law</p></li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table><p>These disclosures take place for the following business or commercial purposes:</p><ul><li>To audit our interactions with you to ensure compliance with applicable law and to measure the effectiveness of our products, services, and advertisements;</li><li>To detect, prevent, and prosecute harmful, fraudulent, or illegal activity;</li><li>To identify and repair bugs on our website or mobile applications;</li><li>To provide services, such as customer service, order fulfillment, and payment processing, which we either conduct or engage service providers to conduct on our behalf;</li><li>For research and development;</li><li>To further our business goals, including to advertise our products and services; and</li><li>For quality assurance.</li></ul><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Sale of Personal Information</span></h5><p>We do not sell your personal information for monetary consideration. However, California law may characterize our sharing of personal information with companies that provide services to us, such as companies that help us to market or advertise our products and services to you, as "sales”. We may “sell” or may have “sold” the following categories of personal information for valuable consideration to the third parties listed below:</p><table border="2" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 80%"><thead><tr><th style="width: 35%;"><p><strong>Category </strong></p></th><th style="width: 65%;"><p><strong>Sold to Third Parties </strong></p></th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><ul><li>- Device identifiers</li><li>- Online or network activity information</li><li>- Commercial information</li><li>- Inferences</li></ul></td><td><p>We may sell or may have sold this information to:</p><ul><li>- advertising companies</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table><p>We do not have actual knowledge that we sell the personal information of minors under 16 years of age.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Financial Incentive</span></h5><p>We may offer you various financial incentives such as discounts and special offers when you provide us with contact information and identifiers such as your name and email address. When you sign-up for our email list or other discounts and special offers, you opt-in to a financial incentive. You may withdraw from a financial incentive at any time by opting out from our emails. Generally, we do not assign monetary or other value to personal information, however, California law requires that we assign such value in the context of financial incentives. In such context, the value of the personal information is related to the estimated cost of providing the relevant financial incentive(s) for which the information was collected.</p><br/><h5 class="title--h5"><span>Your California Privacy Rights</span></h5><p>You have the right to request, twice in a 12 month period, that we disclose to you the personal information we have collected, used, disclosed, and sold about you during the past 12 months. In addition, you have the right to request that we delete the personal information we have collected from you (subject to certain exceptions).</p><ul><li>the categories and specific pieces of personal information we have collected about you;</li><li>the categories of sources from which we collected personal information about you;</li><li>the categories of personal information we disclosed about you for a business purpose;</li><li>the categories of personal information we sold about you and the categories of third parties to whom it was sold; and</li><li>the business or commercial purpose for collecting or selling your personal information.</li></ul><p>In addition, you have the right to request that we delete the personal information we have collected from you (subject to certain exceptions).</p><p>You can exercise your rights by submitting a request through our <a href="http://jomalone.com/ca-do-not-sell">Privacy Request Portal</a> or by contacting us at 1-866-305-4706. Before processing your request, we will take reasonable steps to verify your identity, which will include verifying that the email address from which you submit the request matches the email address we maintain on file for you. In order to ensure you are the owner of the email address, you must respond to a confirmation email that we will send to such email address. In some cases, we may ask that you provide additional information in order to verify your identity.</p><p>You may also designate an authorized agent to make a request on your behalf. The authorized agent may submit the request through our <a href="http://jomalone.com/ca-do-not-sell">Privacy Request Portal</a> and will be required to provide proof that they have been authorized to act on your behalf. If the authorized agent does not provide such proof, you will be required to confirm your identity and the authenticity of the request.</p><p>You can also opt-out of the sale of your personal information by emailing privacy@estee.com, or by clicking <a href="https://www.jomalone.com/ca-do-not-sell">here:</a></p><p>We will not discriminate against you on account of your exercise of your California privacy rights.</p><p>If you would like us to read this Privacy Policy to you, please contact us at 1-866-305-4706.</p><p style="margin-top: 77px;">Copyright © JO MALONE LONDON All worldwide rights reserved.</p></div><p> </p></div></div></div><div class="content-block__link-wrapper content-block__link-wrapper--row"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div>
